/e-sim-compatibility-guide.title: eSIM Compatibility Guide

quick_tips.title: Quick Tips
quick_tips.1: If you see 'Add eSIM' option in settings, your phone supports eSIM
quick_tips.2: Dial *#06# to check for EID number (eSIM identifier), if you cannot see EID number, your phone likely does NOT support eSIM
quick_tips.3: Your device must be unlocked by carrier to use eSIMs from other providers

can_esim_be_used_internationally.title: Can eSIM be used internationally?
can_esim_be_used_internationally.answer: Yes, as long as your phone is eSIM compatible and unlocked, you can use an international eSIM while traveling abroad. That's one of its biggest advantages for international travelers. You can purchase a data plan online, install it before your trip, and activate it the moment you arrive at your destinationâ€”no need to find a SIM card store or deal with roaming fees.

is_my_phone_unlocked.title: Is my phone unlocked to use eSIM?
is_my_phone_unlocked.answer: Regardless of the phone you have, it must be unlocked from carrier restrictions to use eSIM. Some phones are tied to a specific mobile operator and can only use data plans from that network.

/e-sim-compatibility-guide.after_confirming_compatibility: After confirming your device is compatible with eSIM technology, the next step is to install your eSIM. The installation process varies slightly depending on your device type and operating system.
/e-sim-compatibility-guide.check_installation_guide: For detailed step-by-step installation instructions, visit our <link>installation guide</link>

metadata.title: E-SIM Compatibility Guide - ConnectPhone E-SIM
metadata.description: Find out if your device is E-SIM compatible

/e-sim-installation-guide.title: eSIM Installation Guide
/e-sim-installation-guide.first_of_all: First of all, for any device, you need to check if your device is compatible with eSIM technology. Not all devices support eSIM, so it's crucial to verify this first.
/e-sim-installation-guide.to_check_compatibility: To check the compatibility, visit our <link>compatibility guide</link>

quick_tips.title: Quick Installation Tips
quick_tips.1: Install your eSIM the day before your trip for a smooth experience
quick_tips.2: Use QR code method when possible - it's faster and more reliable
quick_tips.3: Always keep your primary SIM for calls and use eSIM for data
quick_tips.4: Make sure data roaming is enabled on your eSIM after installation

general_steps.title: General Installation Steps
general_steps.description: We recommend installing the day before your trip and activating it by selecting our eSIM for 'mobile data' on your phone settings, once you arrive at your destination. Use QR Code Installation if you have another device you can scan from, alternatively follow the Manual setup instructions.

what_you_need.title: What You Need Before Starting
what_you_need.1: A phone compatible with eSIM technology
what_you_need.2: The installation email with QR code from your provider

metadata.title: E-SIM Installation Guide - ConnectPhone E-SIM
metadata.description: Step-by-step guide to install your E-SIM on various devices

footer.description: Your trusted provider for global eSIM connectivity. Stay connected wherever you travel with our reliable and affordable eSIM solutions.
